title: Bug 6656 - Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: On Linux, running build 20011127 (does not happen on build 20011116 on Nt2000), when the Navigator view is resized smaller, the tool items (including pulldown menu icon and close icon) move below the label. This behavior may confuse users.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the application on Linux, running build 20011127 (or a later version). 2. Open the Navigator view. 3. Resize the view to be smaller. 4. Observe that the tool items, including the pulldown menu icon and close icon, move below the label.
